price: Lẹ́yìn náà, A óò gba àwọn Òjíṣẹ́ Wa àti àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ lódodo là. Báyẹn ní ó ṣe jẹ́ ojúṣe Wa láti gba àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo là.
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نُنجِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī rusulanā wa-alladhīna āmanū kadhālika ḥaqqan ʿalaynā nunji al-mu'minīna
